mapper.sql: TEMPLATE_TYPE, TEMPLATE_SEQ, CONTENT, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER,UPDATE_DATE,UPDATE_USER
mapper.insert: insert into c_sms_template (TEMPLATE_TYPE, TEMPLATE_SEQ, CONTENT, STATUS, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER,UPDATE_DATE,UPDATE_USER) values ( #{templateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update c_sms_template
TEMPLATE_TYPE = #{templateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where TEMPLATE_SEQ = #{templateSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_sms_template set TEMPLATE_TYPE = #{templateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TEMPLATE_SEQ = #{templateSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT t.TEMPLATE_TYPE, t.TEMPLATE_SEQ, t.CONTENT, t.STATUS, t.CREATE_DATE, t.CREATE_USER, t.UPDATE_DATE, t.UPDATE_USER FROM c_sms_template AS t ORDER BY t.TEMPLATE_SEQ DESC
